author: oflg
name: Tidme Read
text:

","type":"text/plain"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/readme","text":"Installation and usage tutorial is available at [[Tidme Manual|https://oflg.github.io/Tidme/manual/#Included%20plugins]].

可在 [[墨屉手册|https://oflg.github.io/Tidme/manual/zh-Hans#相关插件]] 查看安装使用教程。","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/sentence":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/sentence","tags":"$:/tags/TidmeRead/annotation","icon":"$:/core/images/add-comment","caption":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/sentence}}","description":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/sentencetip}}","condition":"[<selectionTrim>]","text":"<$action-createtiddler
    $basetitle={{{ [<studyTiddler>] [{$:/language/tidme/read/sentence}] [<selectionTrim>search-replace:g:regexp[\n],[]split[]first[7]join[]] +[join[/]]}}}
    tags="."
    caption="{{||$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/sentence}}"
    text=<<selectionTrim>>
    annotate-text=<<selectionTrim>>
    annotate-prefix=<<selectionPrefix>>
    annotate-suffix=<<selectionSuffix>>
    annotate-colour="LightSkyBlue"
/>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/word":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/buttons/annotation/word","tags":"$:/tags/TidmeRead/annotation","icon":"$:/core/images/help","caption":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/word}}","description":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/wordtip}}","condition":"[<selectionTrim>]","text":"<$action-createtiddler
    $basetitle={{{ [<studyTiddler>] [{$:/language/tidme/read/word}] [<selectionTrim>search-replace:g:regexp[\n],[]] +[join[/]]}}}
    tags="?"
    caption="! {{!!word}}"
    text="{{||$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/word}}"
    word=<<selectionTrim>>
/>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":"<svg width="22pt" height="22pt" class="tc-image-home-button tc-image-button" viewBox="0 0 128 128">

</svg>"},"$:/language/tidme/read/annotate":{"title":"$:/language/tidme/read/annotate","text":"Annotation"},"$:/language/tidme/read/word":{"title":"$:/language/tidme/read/word","text":"Annotate word"},"$:/language/tidme/read/wordtip":{"title":"$:/language/tidme/read/wordtip","text":"Annotate the selected word"},"$:/language/tidme/read/sentence":{"title":"$:/language/tidme/read/sentence","text":"Excerpt sentence"},"$:/language/tidme/read/sentencetip":{"title":"$:/language/tidme/read/sentencetip","text":"Excerpt the selected sentence"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/selectionaction":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/selectionaction","code-body":"yes","text":"<$action-log message="In SelectionTrackerActions" selection=<<selection>>/>
<$list
    filter="[<selection>jsonget[chunks],[0],[text]trim[]!is[blank]]"
    variable="selectionTrim"
>
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selection"
        text=<<selectionTrim>>
    />
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selectionPrefix"
        text={{{ [<selection>jsonget[chunks],[0],[prefix]split[]last[7]join[]] }}}
    />
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selectionSuffix"
        text={{{ [<selection>jsonget[chunks],[0],[suffix]split[]first[7]join[]] }}}
    />
    <$action-popup
        $state=<<dom-data-popup-title>>
        $coords=<<tv-selection-coords>>
    />
</$list>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/startupaction":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/startupaction","tags":"$:/tags/StartupAction","text":"<$list
    filter="[{$:/config/Dynannotate/SelectionTracker/Enable}!match[yes]]"
    variable="ignore"
>
    <$action-setfield
        $tiddler="$:/config/Dynannotate/SelectionTracker/Enable"
        $value="yes"
    />
</$list>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/styles.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/styles.css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".annotation-wrapper {
    min-width: 500px;
    transform: scale(0.7);
    transform-origin: top left;
    margin: 15px 0;
    padding: 10px;
    overflow-y:hidden;
    user-select:none;
}"},"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-text":{"title":"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-text","text":"hide"},"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-prefix":{"title":"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-prefix","text":"hide"},"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-suffix":{"title":"$:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/annotate-suffix","text":"hide"},"$:/config/Tidme/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/read":{"title":"$:/config/Tidme/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/read","code-body":"yes","list-before":"$:/config/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/default","list-after":"$:/config/Tidme/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilters/card","tags":"$:/tags/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilter","text":"[subfilter{$:/config/Tidme/Filters/decktiddler}then[$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/tiddler]]"},"$:/Deck/sentence":{"title":"$:/Deck/sentence","tags":"$:/tags/TidmeDeck","caption":"{{$:/language/tidme/read/sentence}}","description":"","card":"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[.]]","card_unfold":"[tag[.]]","card_exclude":"[tag[!]]","order":"due-new","order_learn":"[sort[due]]","order_new":"[sortan[title]]","order_due":"[sort[due]]","leech_threshold":"8","leech_action":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="!"/>","state_learn":"[state[1]] [state[3]] :filter[{!!due}compare:date:lt<now [UTC]YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ss0XXX>]","state_due":"[state[2]has[due]] -[!days:due[1]]","state_new":"[!has[state]] [state[0]]","p":"{"request_retention":0.9,"maximum_interval":36500,"w":[0.4,0.6,2.4,5.8,4.93,0.94,0.86,0.01,1.49,0.14,0.94,2.18,0.05,0.34,1.26,0.29,2.61]}"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/sentence":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/sentence","code-body":"yes","text":"! <$text text={{{ [{!!text}split[]first[7]join[]] }}}/>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/tiddler":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/tiddler","code-body":"yes","text":"\whitespace trim

\define CJKV() [\u2E80-\u9FFF]

\define click-excerpt-actions()
<$action-setfield
    $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/read/selection"
    text={{{ [<annotationTiddler>get[annotate-text]] }}}
/>
\end

<$let
    popup_title={{{ [[$:/state/popup/selection]addsuffix<studyTiddler>] }}}
>
    <div style="position:relative;">
        <$dynannotate
            filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]!is[draft]has[annotate-text]]"
            actions=<<click-excerpt-actions>>
            popup=<<popup_title>>
            search={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]!<studyTiddler>has[word]get[word]unique[]regexp<CJKV>join[|]addprefix[(]addsuffix[)]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]!<studyTiddler>has[word]get[word]unique[]!regexp<CJKV>join[|]addprefix[\b(]addsuffix[)\b]] +[join[|]] }}}
            searchMode="regexp"
            searchCaseSensitive="no"
            searchClass="tc-dynannotation-search-overlay-animated"
            searchMinLength={{$:/config/Search/MinLength}}
        >
            <div data-popup-title=<<popup_title>> data-selection-actions-title="$:/plugins/tidme/read/selectionaction">
                <div id=<<studyTiddler>> class="dynannotate-chunk">
                    {{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate}}
                </div>
            </div>
        </$dynannotate>
        <$list
            filter="[{$:/temp/tidme/read/selection}!is[blank]]"
            variable="selectionTrim"
        >
            <$let
                selectionTrimLowercase={{{ [<selectionTrim>lowercase[]] }}}
                selectionTrimTitlecase={{{ [<selectionTrim>titlecase[]] }}}
                selectionTrimUppercase={{{ [<selectionTrim>uppercase[]] }}}
                selectionPrefix={{$:/temp/tidme/read/selectionPrefix}}
                selectionSuffix={{$:/temp/tidme/read/selectionSuffix}}
            >
                <$reveal
                    type="popup"
                    state=<<popup_title>>
                    position="belowleft"
                    updatePopupPosition="yes"
                    positionAllowNegative="no"
                    class="tc-popup-keep annotation-wrapper"
                >
                    <div
                        class="tc-drop-down tc-popup-keep"
                        style="min-width:0;"
                    >
                        <$list
                            filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TidmeRead/annotation]!is[draft]]"
                            template="$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/ui/ViewTemplate/button"
                        />
                    </div>
                    <br/>
                    <$list
                        filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]word<selectionTrim>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]word<selectionTrimLowercase>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]word<selectionTrimTitlecase>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]word<selectionTrimUppercase>] [all[shadows+tiddlers]annotate-text<selectionTrim>] +[!is[draft]!<studyTiddler>]"
                    >
                        <$let
                            studyTiddler=""
                            deckTiddler=""
                        >
                            <$transclude tiddler={{{ [<currentTiddler>] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/StoryTiddlerTemplateFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] :and[has[title]![$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/tiddler]else[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate]] }}} />
                        </$let>
                    </$list>
                </$reveal>
            </$let>
        </$list>
    </div>
</$let>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/word":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/read/ui/ViewTemplate/word","code-body":"yes","text":"<main style="width:100%;overflow:hidden;">
    <iframe
        height="400px"
        width="100%"
        src={{{ [{!!word}encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[https://dict.youdao.com/recite/words/#!/dict/engchn?le=eng&q=]] }}}
        frameborder=0
    />
</main>"}}}
title: $:/plugins/tidme/read
